   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssh_sup_SUITE).
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("ssh.hrl").
   25: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([suite/0,
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: -export([default_tree/1,
   38:          killed_acceptor_restarts/1,
   39:          shell_channel_tree/1,
   40:          sshc_subtree/1,
   41:          sshd_subtree/1,
   42:          sshd_subtree_profile/1]).
   43: 
   44: -define(USER, "Alladin").
   45: -define(PASSWD, "Sesame").
   46: 
   47: -define(WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN, 500).
   48: 
   49: -define(SSHC_SUP(Pid), {sshc_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   50: -define(SSHD_SUP(Pid), {sshd_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   51: -define(LSOCKET_SUP(Pid), {ssh_lsocket_sup, Pid, supervisor, [ssh_lsocket_sup]}).
   52: -define(SYSTEM_SUP(Pid,Address),
   53:         {{ssh_system_sup, Address}, Pid, supervisor,[ssh_system_sup]}).
   54: -define(CONNECTION_SUP(Pid), {_,Pid, supervisor,[ssh_connection_sup]}).
   55: -define(ACCEPTOR_SUP(Pid,Address),
   56:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,supervisor,[ssh_acceptor_sup]}).
   57: -define(ACCEPTOR_WORKER(Pid,Address),
   58:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,worker,[ssh_acceptor]}).
   59: 
   60: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: suite() ->
   64:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   65:      {timetrap,{seconds,50}}].
   66: 
   67: all() ->
   68:     [default_tree, sshc_subtree, sshd_subtree, sshd_subtree_profile,
   69:      killed_acceptor_restarts, shell_channel_tree].
   70: 
   71: groups() ->
   72:     [].
   73: 
   74: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   81:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   82:        begin
   83: 	   PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   84: 	   UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
   85: 	   file:make_dir(UserDir),
   86: 	   [{userdir, UserDir} | Config]
   87:        end).
   88: 
   89: end_per_suite(_) ->
   90:     ok.
   91: 
   92: init_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
   93:     ssh:start(),
   94:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   95:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
   96:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
   97:                                              {user_passwords,
   98:                                               [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
   99:     [{server, {Pid, Host, Port}} | Config];
  100: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  101:     end_per_testcase(Case, Config),
  102:     ssh:start(),
  103:     Config.
  104: end_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
  105:     {Pid,_,_} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  106:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  107:     ssh:stop();
  108: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
  109:     ssh:stop().
  110: 
  111: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: %% Test cases
  113: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: default_tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     TopSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(ssh_sup),
  116:     2 = length(TopSupChildren),
  117:     {value, ?SSHC_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshc_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  118:     {value, ?SSHD_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshd_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  119:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  120:     ?wait_match([?LSOCKET_SUP(_)],
  121:                 supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  122: 
  123: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  124: sshc_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  126:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  127:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  128:     Pid1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  129:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  130:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  131:                                              {user, ?USER},
  132:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  133:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  134:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup)],
  135: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  136:                 [ConnectionSup]),
  137:     check_sshc_system_tree(ConnectionSup, Pid1, Config),
  138:     Pid2 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  139:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  140:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  141:                                              {user, ?USER},
  142:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  143:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  144:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(_),
  145:                  ?CONNECTION_SUP(_)
  146:                 ],
  147: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  148:     ssh:close(Pid1),
  149:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(_)
  150:                 ],
  151: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  152:     ssh:close(Pid2),
  153:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)).
  154: 
  155: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  156: sshd_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  157:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  158:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  159:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  160:                                                   {user_passwords,
  161:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  162:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Daemon]),
  163:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  164:                                               port=Port,
  165:                                               profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE}),
  166:                  ?LSOCKET_SUP(_)],
  167: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  168: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  169:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  170:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  171:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port),
  172:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  173:     ?wait_match([?LSOCKET_SUP(_)], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  174: 
  175: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: sshd_subtree_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  178:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  179:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  180:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  181:                                                   {user_passwords,
  182:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  183:                                                   {profile, Profile}]),
  184:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Profile=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Profile,Daemon]),
  185:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  186:                                               port=Port,
  187:                                               profile=Profile}),
  188:                 ?LSOCKET_SUP(_)],
  189: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  190: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  191:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  192:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  193:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port, Profile),
  194:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  195:     ?wait_match([?LSOCKET_SUP(_)], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  196: 
  197: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  198: killed_acceptor_restarts(Config) ->
  199:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  200:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  201:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  202:     {ok, DaemonPid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  203:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  204:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  205:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  206: 
  207:     {ok, DaemonPid2} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  208:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  209:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  210:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  211: 
  212:     Port  = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid),
  213:     Port2 = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid2),
  214:     true = (Port /= Port2),
  215: 
  216:     {ok,[{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  217:     {ok,[{AccPid2,ListenAddr,Port2}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid2),
  218: 
  219:     true = (AccPid /= AccPid2),
  220: 
  221:     %% Connect first client and check it is alive:
  222:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  223:                                                    {save_accepted_host, false},
  224:                                               {user_interaction, false},
  225:                                               {user, ?USER},
  226:                                               {password, ?PASSWD},
  227:                                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  228:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  229: 
  230:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  231: 
  232:     %% Make acceptor restart:
  233:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [AccPid]),
  234:     exit(AccPid, kill),
  235:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(AccPid)),
  236: 
  237:     %% Check it is a new acceptor and wait if it is not:
  238:     ?wait_match({ok,[{AccPid1,ListenAddr,Port}]}, AccPid1=/=AccPid,
  239:                 acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  240:                 AccPid1,
  241:                 500, 30),
  242: 
  243:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []),
  244: 
  245:     true = (AccPid1 =/= AccPid2),
  246: 
  247:     %% Connect second client and check it is alive:
  248:     C2 =
  249:         case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  250:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  251:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  252:                                              {user, ?USER},
  253:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  254:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]) of
  255:             {ok,_C2} ->
  256:                 _C2;
  257:             _Other ->
  258:                 ct:log("new connect failed: ~p~n~n~s",[_Other,lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  259:                 ct:fail("Re-connect failed!", [])
  260:         end,
  261: 
  262:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  263: 
  264:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  265: 
  266:     %% Check first client is still alive:
  267:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  268: 
  269:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid2),
  270:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid2), 1000, 30),
  271:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  272:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  273: 
  274:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid),
  275:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid), 1000, 30),
  276:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]), 1000, 5),
  277:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]), 1000, 5).
  278: 
  279: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  280: shell_channel_tree(Config) ->
  281:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  282:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  283:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  284:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  285:     TimeoutShell =
  286:         fun() ->
  287:                 io:format("TimeoutShell started!~n",[]),
  288:                 timer:sleep(5000),
  289:                 ct:log("~p TIMEOUT!",[self()])
  290:         end,
  291:     {Daemon, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  292:                                                 {user_dir, UserDir},
  293:                                                 {password, "morot"},
  294:                                                 {shell, fun(_User) ->
  295:                                                                 spawn(TimeoutShell)
  296:                                                         end
  297:                                                 }
  298:                                             ]),
  299:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  300: 						      {user, "foo"},
  301: 						      {password, "morot"},
  302: 						      {user_interaction, true},
  303: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  304: 
  305:     [ConnectionSup,_ChPid|_] = Sups0 = chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  306: 
  307:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  308:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef,ChannelId0),
  309:     success = ssh_connection:ptty_alloc(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0, [{pty_opts,[{onlcr,1}]}]),
  310: 
  311:     ?wait_match([{_,_, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  312:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  313:                  {connection,_,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  314:                 ],
  315: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  316:                 [ChSup]),
  317:     ?wait_match([{_,GroupPid,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}
  318:                 ],
  319:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  320:                 [GroupPid]),
  321: 
  322: 
  323:     {links,GroupLinks} = erlang:process_info(GroupPid, links),
  324:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, GroupLinks = ~p Sups0 = ~p",[GroupPid,GroupLinks,Sups0]),
  325:     [ShellPid] = GroupLinks--[ChSup],
  326:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, ShellPid = ~p",[GroupPid,ShellPid]),
  327: 
  328:     receive
  329:         {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"TimeoutShell started!",Rest/binary>>}} ->
  330:             ct:log("TimeoutShell started. Rest = ~p", [Rest]),
  331:             receive
  332:                 %%---- wait for the connection to terminate
  333:                 {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef,{closed,ChannelId0}} ->
  334:                     ct:log("Connection terminated",[]),
  335:                     case {chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  336:                           process_info(GroupPid),
  337:                           process_info(ShellPid)} of
  338:                         {Sups0, undefined, undefined} ->
  339:                             %% SUCCESS
  340:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon);
  341:                         {Sups0, _, undefined}  ->
  342:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  343:                             ct:fail("Group proc lives!");
  344:                         {Sups0, undefined, _}  ->
  345:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  346:                             ct:fail("Shell proc lives!");
  347:                         _ ->
  348:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  349:                             ct:fail("Sup tree changed!")
  350:                     end
  351:             after 10000 ->
  352:                     ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  353:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  354:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  355:                     ct:fail("CLI Timeout 1")
  356:             end
  357:     after 10000 ->
  358:             ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  359:             ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  360:             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  361:             ct:fail("CLI Timeout 2")
  362:     end.
  363: 
  364: chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon) ->
  365:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup),
  366: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)
  367:                 ],
  368: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  369:                 [ConnectionSup,AccSup]),
  370:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  371:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  372:                  {connection,ServerConnPid,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  373:                 ],
  374: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  375: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup,ServerConnPid]),
  376:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  377:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  378:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)],
  379:                 supervisor:which_children(AccSup),
  380:                 []),
  381:     [ConnectionSup, ChSup, ServerConnPid, AccSup, FwdAccSup].
  382: 
  383: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  384: %% Help functions
  385: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  386: check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, Host, Port, Config) ->
  387:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  388:     ClientConn = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  389:                                                    {user_interaction, false},
  390:                                                    {user, ?USER},
  391:                                                    {password, ?PASSWD},
  392:                                                    {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  393:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup),
  394: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)],
  395: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  396:                 [ConnectionSup,AccSup]),
  397:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  398:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  399:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  400: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  401: 		[FwdAccSup,ServerConn]),
  402:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  403:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)], supervisor:which_children(AccSup)),
  404:     {ok,PidC} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ClientConn),
  405:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  406:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  407:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  408: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  409: 		[ChSup,ServerConn]),
  410: 
  411:     ?wait_match([{_,PidS,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}],
  412:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  413:                 [PidS]),
  414:     true = (PidS =/= PidC),
  415:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  416:     ssh:close(ClientConn).
  417: 
  418: 
  419: check_sshc_system_tree(ConnectionSup, Connection, _Config) ->
  420:     ?wait_match([?CONNECTION_SUP(ConnectionSup)],
  421:                 supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  422:                 [ConnectionSup]),
  423:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  424:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  425:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  426:                 ],
  427: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  428: 		[FwdAccSup]),
  429:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  430: 
  431:     {ok,ChPid1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  432:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  433:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  434:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  435:                 ],
  436: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  437: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  438: 
  439:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  440:                 ],
  441:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  442:                 [ChPid1]),
  443: 
  444:     {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  445:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  446:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  447:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  448:                 ],
  449: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  450: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  451: 
  452:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]},
  453:                  {_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  454:                 ],
  455:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  456:                 [ChPid1,ChPid2]),
  457: 
  458:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid1]),
  459:     exit(ChPid1, kill),
  460:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  461:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  462:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  463:                 ],
  464: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  465: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  466: 
  467:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  468:                 ],
  469:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  470:                 [ChPid2]),
  471: 
  472:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid2]),
  473:     exit(ChPid2, kill),
  474:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  475:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  476:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  477:                 ],
  478: 		supervisor:which_children(ConnectionSup),
  479: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  480: 
  481:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  482: 
  483:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []).
  484: 
  485: 
  486: 
  487: acceptor_pid(DaemonPid) ->
  488:     Parent = self(),
  489:     Pid = spawn(fun() ->
  490:                         Parent ! {self(), supsearch,
  491:                                   [{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}
  492: 
  493:                                    || ?SYSTEM_SUP(DPid,#address{address=ListenAddr,port=Port,profile=NS})
  494:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  495:                                       DPid == DaemonPid,
  496: 
  497:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSupPid,_)
  498:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(DaemonPid),
  499: 
  500:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(AccPid, #address{address=L2,
  501:                                                                         port=P2,
  502:                                                                         profile=NS2})
  503:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(AccSupPid),
  504:                                       L2 == ListenAddr,
  505:                                       P2 == Port,
  506:                                       NS2 == NS]}
  507:                 end),
  508:     receive {Pid, supsearch, L} -> {ok,L}
  509:     after 2000 -> timeout
  510:     end.
  511: 
  512: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  513: flush_rest() -> lists:reverse(flush_rest([])).
  514: 
  515: flush_rest(Acc) ->
  516:     receive Any -> [Any|Acc]
  517:     after 0 -> Acc
  518:     end.
